row.process:
:SET &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL('YYYYMMDD') :SET &heure# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL('HHMM') :SET &CLIENT#=FORMAT("&CLIENTNR#","0000") :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd &PATH_UTILITY# if not exist "&PATH_REORG_REP#" ( mkdir "&PATH_REORG_REP#" ) echo ************************************* echo execution du unload: echo ucybdbun -V -LE -BREORG -D -X&PATH_REORG_REP#\&CLIENT#\REORG_&CLIENT#_&date#_&heure#.txt echo ************************************* echo. ucybdbun -V -LE -BREORG -D -X&PATH_REORG_REP#\&CLIENT#\REORG_&CLIENT#_&date#_&heure#.txt
@set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX"
cd &PATH_UTILITY# [[ -d "&PATH_REORG_REP#" ]] || mkdir "&PATH_REORG_REP#" echo "*************************************" echo "execution du unload:" echo "./ucybdbun -V -LE -BREORG -D -X&PATH_REORG_REP#/&CLIENT#/REORG_&CLIENT#_&date#_&heure#.txt" echo "*************************************" echo "" ./ucybdbun -V -LE -BREORG -D -X&PATH_REORG_REP#/&CLIENT#/REORG_&CLIENT#_&date#_&heure#.txt rc=$?
exit $rc
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.pre_process: :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1="&CLIENTNR#" :INC JOBI.CLIENT_WITHOUT_MAINTENANCE, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.UNIX_SHELL, NOFOUND=IGNORE
